meanings.definition: The state or quality of being painless.
meanings.sent1: The painlessness of the procedure surprised the patient.
meanings.sent2: She appreciated the painlessness of the injection.
meanings.sent3: The painlessness of the dentist's office made her smile.
meanings.sent4: The painlessness of the experience was like floating on a cloud.
meanings.sent5: The painlessness of the numbing cream made her forget about the needle.

meanings.sent1: The painlessness after taking the medication was a relief.
meanings.sent2: He enjoyed the painlessness of his headache after a good night's sleep.
meanings.sent3: The painlessness of the situation was a pleasant surprise.
meanings.sent4: The painlessness of the moment felt like a dream.
meanings.sent5: The painlessness of the massage made him feel rejuvenated.
